subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=72|rad=日|as=09|sn=13|four=67056|canj=ABJJ|ids=⿰日軍}}

# [[sunshine]]
# [[light]], [[bright]], [[radiant]]
* When referring to the ''[[guqin]]'' zither:
# the 13 white dots made of mother-of-pearl inlaid onto the surface board marking the harmonic positions
# same as [[徽]] (variant)
